tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was extremely anxious on the day of the surgery, but the moment before my surgery i was told everything about the procedure, Dr Rajesh Sheety is highly qualified and extremely compassionate with his patients which is rare to find in any other dental clinics. My surgery was absolutely painless and felt like it was completed just in a blink. I no longer fear any dental treatments and never thought a surgery could be this painless, not even the anesthesia needle prick gave me any pain. The team of doctors are very helpful even for the care needed post the treatment, i‚Äôm very satisfied and happy. I could forever rely on Dazzle for all my dental worries, and would absolutely recommend anyone who wants to get the best painless dental treatments done. In my experience so far,  this is the best dental clinic you will see in our country.
reply_text: Thanks so much Nisha üôèüèª

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Rajesh Shetty is a wonderful person; ****** ******* *** professional. 
Moreover the entire ambience and the demeanor of the doctor and the staff reverberates positivity.
On the very first day Dr. Shetty patiently heard me out and gave an overview of the line of treatment. The best part was that he addressed the problems which I was facing and did not try to add on anything extra into the treatment.
All the scans and x-rays were done on the same day for the Doctor's perusal.
Within a day I received a call from the Doctor wherein he gave a detailed insight about how they were planning on going ahead with the procedure and the estimate on the cost involved.
Since it was a surgical procedure, involving extraction of all 4 wisdom teeth and previously affixed titanium plates (i had undergone an orthognathic surgery a few years ago) i was given a detailed overview of the same. 
In fact the Doctor was kind enough to let me choose between General Anaesthesia or Local Anesthesia depending on my preference.
Once the day of the surgery was decided, i received  confirmatory calls/messages from the clinic.
On the day of the surgery, the Doctor was very reassuring and ensured that I was comfortable, especially since I had opted for the procedure to carried out under LA.
During the entire surgery the Dr. checked on me to ensure that there was no pain and that I was at ease throughout.
After the surgery all the post-surgical precautionary instructions and necessary prescriptions were given. 
I received messages/calls immediately the next day from the clinic inquiring about my well being.
The Doctor also called me for a follow up to check on how the healing and recovery was happening.
The reason I have been so descriptive is because of the extremely positive and professional experience that I have had throughout my treatment.
I would definitely recommend Dr. Shetty and Dazzle Dental and i am happy to have a dentist who really cares and ensures that dental treatment is not all that scary that it seems to be.
Keep up the amazing work Dazzle Dental!
Cheers!
reply_text: Thanks so so much Chaitanya ‚Ä¶ i am humbled by your kind words üôèüèªüòÄ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As a rule I dont write reviews. That is ,until I was blessed to enter Dr Rajesh Shetty's Dazzle clinic
Previous experiences that did not meet expectations were instantly dispelled by a remarkable combination of sterling qualities that Dr Shetty exemplifies
In him we find a courteous kind nature that sets the patient completely at their ease with a logical and thorough explanation of the given condition with all treatment options that are applicable for an informed decision
As the treatment progresses not only does one instantly recognise the sure hand of a practitioner who is a master of his profession but also a caring soul who encourages the patient to avail of every professional support option to create  an end result that  is  as complete and perfect as possible
If we add to this an excellent support team and  fully up-to-date modern surgery surrounded by an enchanting tree house setting  we have all the elements to ensure that your treatment is  as stress free and effective as humanly possible
Thank you Dr Shetty!
reply_text:
Dear Reshma and Peter 
Thank you so much for your kind words.
Your appreciation will only make us strive harder to provide a better experience to all our patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had a root canal treatment at Dazzle Dental Clinic, performed by Dr. Shetty. My experience was exceedingly positive, marked by his high level of professionalism and expertise. Dr. Shetty thoroughly explained the procedure, easing any anxieties I had, and the treatment itself was more comfortable than I anticipated, thanks to his use of advanced techniques and equipment. 

The clinic has exceptional hygiene standards, with a clean and welcoming environment.  Overall, I am highly satisfied with the service and care provided by Dr. Shetty and Dazzle Dental Clinic, and would highly recommend them for their patient-centric approach and meticulous attention to detail.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I‚Äôm originally from Los Angeles and every year I come to India to visit my mother.  Due to my busy schedule  I couldn‚Äôt get my dental work in LA . One   of my family friends recommended Dr.  Rajesh Shetty and I decided to go in for a consultation. Dr. Rajesh Shetty gave me a comprehensive  diagnostic evaluation of my molar  with X-rays and CT scans which I was thankful for as CT scans are usually not done in LA  due to insurance limitations. His expertise and communication skills are truly remarkable. In addition ,his whole team is well trained and  comply with U.S dental protocols and do not pressure patients to get unnecessary treatments. Thank you for your all-around caring, and compassionate care.

review:
Highly experienced, caring dentist with a state of the art practice.

Coming from the UK, and being a medical practitioner myself, I have very high expectations from any doctor I see. Dr Rajesh Shetty surpassed all of these.

One of the kindest humans I‚Äôve met, he attentively listened to all my wants and needs and then made a plan for me accordingly.

He goes above and beyond his duty of care and checked in regularly post surgery for aftercares.

The practice has all the latest equipment, techniques and in house 3D scanners as well as labs too. 

I couldn‚Äôt recommend him enough.

review: I actually came to Dr.Rajesh‚Äôs clinic without an appointment as I had fallen and broken my front tooth. Due to it being an urgent issue he was kind enough to take my case immediately and fixed my chipped tooth in a couple of hours. It literally looks like  nothing ever happened! He was phenomenally patient, kind and considerate. He explained every aspect of the procedure before we undertook it and during the procedure he would explain what he was doing as well. He was calm and constantly checked with me as to whether I was alright. He clearly wanted the experience to be painless and comfortable. I was truly in safe hands and he definitely brought a dazzle to my smile!

review: I had an outstanding experience with Dr. Shetty and the Dazzle team. We went through a series of surgeries and implant procedures and Dr. Shetty was insightful, understanding and accommodating. I travel regularly and Dr. Shetty was always mindful and made himself and the team available even on normal off days to accommodate my phases of treatment. I got regular follow up messages to check how I was doing, and Dr. Shetty patiently explained and discussed every step of the process and guided me through a sequence of visits and procedures that spanned several months. context: Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Teeth Reshaping,Dental Surgery,Dental Cleaning,
review:
Recently, I have been operated by Dr. Rajesh Shetty at his Bandra clinic and got my two wisdom teeth extracted under IV sedation. In my case one of the teeth was constantly bothering me for quite sometime and was in a fairly complex 
condition which is why I was reluctant to get it done under local anaesthesia so I consulted Dr. Shetty and  postulated all my pre surgery concerns, not only he explained the procedure patiently to me but he also resolved my nervousness about this newly introduced I V Sedation procedure which I guess is relatively unheard & uncommon in India. After comprehending everything I went ahead for the surgery which was absolutely painless & stress free. The procedure went smooth without giving any discomfort to me.  I am relieved from the constant botheration I had in my tooth and really happy  with Dr. Shetty‚Äôs expertise. Grateful to you Dr. Shetty for giving me an anxiety free & a relaxed procedure. Thank you. God bless!!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words üôèüèª
